tool_description: Evaluates skin moisture levels and water retention capacity to determine hydration needs.

skin_tightness.description: Skin tightness feeling after cleansing (1-5, where 1=no tightness, 5=very tight)

flaking_presence.description: Whether visible flaking or peeling occurs

product_absorption.description: How quickly moisturizers absorb: immediately, quickly, slowly, or sits_on_surface

fine_line_visibility.description: Visibility of fine lines due to dehydration (1-5 scale)

error_messages: Invalid tightness scale: skin_tightness must be integer between 1-5.
Invalid absorption rate: product_absorption must be one of [immediately, quickly, slowly, sits_on_surface].
Invalid line visibility: fine_line_visibility must be integer between 1-5.
Missing hydration indicator: All parameters required for accurate moisture assessment.
usage: Evaluate skin immediately after cleansing and note how it responds to moisturizer application. Assess fine lines when face is relaxed.
